name: Climate Data Store - Copernicus
description: A single point of access to a wide range of quality-assured climate datasets distributed in the cloud, including observations, historical climate data records, estimates of Essential Climate Variables, global and regional climate reanalyses, seasonal forecasts and climate projections. Access to data is open, free and unrestricted. The CDS also provides tools for analyzing and predicting the impacts of climate change and supports a wide range of users with different needs.
